author: arminw
msg: fix, check for CallableStatement usage (on insert, update, delete) was too strict. It always expected that return values are used, this cause problems for all SP without return values (in these cases only a PreparedStmt instead of a CallableStmt was used --> error)

author: arminw
msg: add test: persistence via stored procedures

msg: fix, call SP only for supported DB
